column2: Ready to have a go at decrypting that booklet?
Okay Ace, go ahead and launch Leviathan
Did you figure out how to decrypt it? I'm sure we need to go in the hacking panel first.
Here we are! Alright, so what do we need to do to crack this wide open?

Sweet! You did it! Now we can read it.

OMG it's about Leviathan! Total. Genius. Hacker. 

I wonder why it was encrypted. We should scan it all for hints. See you at the Clubhouse.
